articles.title: Microsoft is finally improving Windows 11’s dark mode - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is improving its dark mode in Windows 11. A new test build includes a dark theme on the file operation dialogs.

articles.title: Last-minute Google leak reveals brand-new 67W charger, cheaper Pixelsnap stand, and pricier cases - Android Authority
articles.description: A last-minute leak has revealed prices of the upcoming Google accessories, and we're in for some surprises, including price drops and a new charger.

articles.description: More new info on upcoming Switch and Switch 2 game, Pokémon Legends: Z-A.

articles.title: 'I'm blind - Meta AI glasses allow me to work again' - BBC
articles.description: Andy Evans says he gave up work due to his sight loss, but now has a job helping other blind people.

articles.title: Cracking Abandonware DRM Like It’s 1999 - Hackaday
